document.full_text: nikita tikhonov was sentenced to life in prison, russia's most stringent punishment, on friday for fatally shooting a human rights lawyer and a young journalist two years ago.
document.title: europe: russia: lawyer's killer gets life term
lines_and_colors: nikita tikhonov was sentenced to life in prison, russia's most stringent punishment, on friday for fatally shooting a human rights lawyer and a young journalist two years ago.
